channel.title: My MINECRAFT CPU [with download]
channel.description:
Well pictures are a thousand words i guess :D
but before i got onto the pictures, here are the specs
CPU: 8 bit RAM: 4 bytes Speed: slow prosessor type: ripple carry
PICS
RAM [IMG]http://i1200.photobucket.com/albums/bb330/shrogg/2011-03-04_171347.png[/img] The ram input bus [IMG]http://i1200.photobucket.com/albums/bb330/shrogg/2011-03-04_171421.png[/img] 4 bytes of ram (its huge) [IMG]http://i1200.photobucket.com/albums/bb330/shrogg/2011-03-04_171818.png[/img] the actual adding part [IMG]http://i1200.photobucket.com/albums/bb330/shrogg/2011-03-04_171829.png[/img] another pic of the ram and cpu [IMG]http://i1200.photobucket.com/albums/bb330/shrogg/2011-03-04_171840.png[/img]
DOWNLOAD [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?nhgybmhd9b8d0st]http://www.mediafire.com/?nhgybmhd9b8d0st[/url]

item.title: My MINECRAFT CPU [with download]
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:27, topic:384814”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=480574.msg3519638#msg3519638 date=1299310657]

can it download porn?

… no?

So what does this do, exactly?..

well at the moment all it does is add up to 8 numbers together (the max total number being 128 (soon to be 1024))
it can also store 4 bytes of binary.
after i get the main adder working fully im going to install a 5 clock so the cpu can read through multible lines of binary (that you program into the ram), it wont be able to do much with the binary tho… (as it does around 1 calculation/second)

And how does that work? Don’t really see how you could plug numbers in there…
[/quote]

Levers which acts as numbers.

Switch 0 = 0 and so on.[/quote]

Ah, I get it now. Thanks.

Read full topic
